Normal.name: Haisenkyaku
Normal.notes: To Hai Shiki,  to Bokutai (during guard or hit)

Bokutai.name: Bokutai
Bokutai.notes: If you don't use a Bokutai move while in a Bokutai stance, go into Haishiki stance.

Dokuritsu-Shiki.name: Fukushintai
Dokuritsu-Shiki.notes: High guard break, no damage with high guard, To Hai Shiki

Dokuritsu-Shiki.name: Dokuritsu Senshou
command: From Dokuritsu Shiki (vs. high punch/mid punch/low punch/elbow)

Kyo-Shiki.name: Hairenkyaku
Kyo-Shiki.notes: To Hai Shiki, (during guard or hit)  to Bokutai

Rising-Attacks.name: Koushutai
command: (lying face down, feet forward / side roll)

Rising-Attacks.name: Koushutai
command: (lying face down, feet forward / front roll)

Rising-Attacks.name: Zensentai
command: (lying face down, head forward / side roll)

Rising-Attacks.name: Zensentai
command: (lying face down, head forward / back roll)

Rising-Attacks.name: Zensentai
command: (lying face up, feet forward / side roll)

Rising-Attacks.name: Zensentai
command: (lying face up, feet forward / back roll)

Rising-Attacks.name: Koushutai
command: (lying face up, head forward / side roll)

Rising-Attacks.name: Koushutai
command: (lying face up, head forward / front roll)

Rising-Attacks.name: Kousou Sentai
command: (lying face down, feet forward / front roll)

Rising-Attacks.name: Zensou Sentai
command: (lying face down, head forward / side roll)

Rising-Attacks.name: Zensou Sentai
command: (lying face down, head forward / back roll)

Rising-Attacks.name: Zensou Sentai
command: (lying face up, feet forward / side roll)

Rising-Attacks.name: Zensou Sentai
command: (lying face up, feet forward / back roll)

Rising-Attacks.name: Kousou Sentai
command: (lying face up, head forward / side roll)

Rising-Attacks.name: Kousou Sentai
command: (lying face up, head forward / front roll)
